description:
Note : The Price will go up to ( 49 $ ) again soon .

( OVER Than 506 Students Enrolled In This Course )

- We will learn how to Drive a Massive Traffic To A Website Or Blogger From YouTube by install the new feature of YouTube Cards

- How to setup the YouTube Cards for website in the YouTube videos to drive a massive traffic for a website or blogger .

- How to setup YouTube Cards for a playlist Videos to increase YouTube videos Views and that will make indirect traffic to the website after you installing the YouTube Cards on each video in the channel .

- How to measure the traffic that come from the videos after installing YouTube Cards in the wordpress site .

- How to use the Call to action in the video description to drive more traffic to your website.

- How to make a Product Catalog to Sell Products for your business using YouTube Cards and saving a lot of money on promotion campaigns .

- How to customize the YouTube Cards Time in the video

- How to make a YouTube Cards Analytics to study your customers behaviors to generate more sales .
title: Promote Business & Get Income generation By YouTube Cards
